channel.title: Death
channel.description:
Hey guys im curious on how to make it so when you die you lose all ur stuff... I looked and could not find applydead in player.java
this is a 562 loading 659 rs2hd
Any ideas???

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Ok i searched death and this is basically the only thing reasonably possible for the deal…

[code]package com.rs2hd.content;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import com.rs2hd.model.Skills;
import com.rs2hd.content.LevelUp;
import com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender;
import java.util.*;
import com.rs2hd.event.Event;
import com.rs2hd.io.XStreamPlayerLoader;
import com.rs2hd.GameEngine;
import com.rs2hd.content.Combat.CombatType;
import com.rs2hd.content.clans.Clan;
import com.rs2hd.content.minigames.dungman;
import com.rs2hd.model.Hits.Hit;
import com.rs2hd.util.Misc;
import com.rs2hd.content.minigames.FightPits;
import com.rs2hd.content.minigames.clanminis.WKInvasion;
import com.rs2hd.event.Event;
import com.rs2hd.model.Entity;
import com.rs2hd.model.NPC;
import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.model.World;

/**

  • The death event handles player and npc deaths. Drops loot, does animation, teleportation, etc.
  • @author Graham

*/
public class DeathEvent extends Event {

private Entity entity;
private boolean firstNpcStage = false;

/**
 * Creates the death event for the specified entity.
 * @param entity The player or npc whose death has just happened.
 */

public DeathEvent(final Entity entity) {
	super(4000);
	this.entity = entity;
	World.getWorld().registerEvent(new Event(600) {
		public void execute() {
			entity.animate(entity.getDeathAnimation());
			this.stop();
		}
	});
}

public void KqTransform(final Entity entity) {
	final NPC n = (NPC) entity;
	if (n.getId() == 1158) {
		n.setId(1161);
		n.graphics(1055);
		World.getWorld().registerEvent(new Event(6000) {
			public void execute() {
				n.setId(1160);
				entity.setHp(entity.getMaxHp());
				entity.setDead(false);
				this.stop();
			}
		});

	}
}

@Override
public void execute() {
	if(entity instanceof NPC) {
		if(!firstNpcStage) {
			NPC n = (NPC) entity;
			if (n.getId() == 1158) { //kalphite queen transform
				entity.setDead(true);
				KqTransform(entity);
				n.resetAttack();
				this.stop();
				return;
			}
			Player killer = n.getKiller();
			if (n.getId() == 8127) { //dark core energy
				GameEngine.DarkCoreOn = false;
				n.delete(n);
			}
			if (n.isIsFamiliar()) {
				n.delete(n);
			}
			if (n.getId() == 8327 || n.getId() == 8326 || n.getId() == 8325) { //tormented demon
				n.setId(8324);	
			}
			if (n.getId() == 8350 || n.getId() == 8351) {  //tormented demon
				n.setId(8352);	
			}
			if (n.getId() == 1160) { //kalphite queen
				n.setId(1158);	
			}
			if(killer != null) {
				n.giveSlayer(killer);
			}
			n.clearKillersHits();
			for(int i : WKInvasion.KNIGHTS) {
				if(n.getId() == i) {
					n.destroy();
					World.getWorld().getNpcs().remove(n);
					this.stop();
					return;
				}
			}
			entity.setHidden(true);
			if (n.getId() != 8127 && !n.isIsFamiliar()) {
				this.setTick(n.getDefinition().getRespawn()*500);
				this.firstNpcStage = true;
			}else{
				n.destroy();
				World.getWorld().getNpcs().remove(n);
				this.stop();
			}
		} else {
			NPC n = (NPC) entity;
			if (n.getId() != 8127) {
				n.setLocation(n.getOriginalLocation());
				entity.setHp(entity.getMaxHp());
				entity.setHidden(false);
				entity.setDead(false);
				this.stop();
			} else {
				n.destroy();
				World.getWorld().getNpcs().remove(n);
				this.stop();
			}
		}
	} else if(entity instanceof Player) {
		Player player = (Player) entity;
		boolean insideclanwars = player.getLocation().getClanLevel() > 0 && player.getLocation().getClanLevel() <= 15;
		boolean insidepits = player.getLocation().getX() >= 2381 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 2413 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 5131 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 5166;
		boolean insidepits2 = player.getLocation().getX() >= 3160 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 3179 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 9755 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 9763;
		if(!player.getSession().isConnected() || player.isDestroyed()) {
			this.stop();
			return;
		}
		Player killer = player.getKiller();
		if (player.Wrath == true) {
			player.getPrayerEffects().processAncientPrayers(player, killer);
		}
		player.clearKillersHits();
		if (killer != null && player.getLocation().getX() >= 2756 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 2875 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 5512 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 5627 && player.getLocation().getZ() == 0) {
			killer.KC++;
			killer.PkPoints++;
			killer.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have defeated "+player.getDisplayName()+", you have now "+killer.PkPoints+ " pk shop points.");
			player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
		} else if (killer != null && player.getLocation().getX() >= 2381 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 2413 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 5131 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 5166 || killer != null && player.getLocation().getX() >= 3160 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 3179 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 9755 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 9763) {
			killer.KC++;
			killer.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have defeated "+player.getDisplayName()+".");
			player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
		} else if (killer != null && player.getLocation().getX() >= 2756 && player.getLocation().getX() <= 2875 && player.getLocation().getY() >= 5512 && player.getLocation().getY() <= 5627 && player.getLocation().getZ() == 4) {
			killer.KC++;
			killer.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have defeated "+player.getDisplayName()+".");
			player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
		} else if (killer != null && !insideclanwars && !insidepits && !insidepits2) {
			killer.KC++;
			killer.PkPoints++;
			killer.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have defeated "+player.getDisplayName()+", you have now "+killer.PkPoints+ " pk shop points.");
			player.getWalkingQueue().reset();
		}
		if (entity.isDead() == false) {
			entity.teleport(Entity.DEFAULT_LOCATION);
			this.stop();
			return;
		}
		entity.setHp(entity.getMaxHp());
		entity.setDead(false);
		if(killer != null) {
			entity.dropLoot(killer);
		}
		if(player.inFightPits || player.inFightPits()) {
			player.inFightPits = false;
			entity.teleport(FightPits.lobby);
		} else {
			if(player.inClanWars()) 
				entity.teleport(Entity.CLAN_DEATH);
			else 
				entity.teleport(Entity.DEFAULT_LOCATION);
		}
		World.getWorld().registerEvent(new Event(500) {
			@Override
			public void execute() {
				Player p = (Player) entity;
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage("Oh dear u just got Fucked :(");
				p.getActionSender().sendConfig(5000, p.getHp()*10);
  				p.getActionSender().sendSkillLevel(3);
  				p.getUpdateFlags().setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);
				p.poisonTicks = 0;
				p.getActionSender().removeTab();
				p.ditch = 0;
				p.resetAttack();
				GameEngine.prayer.PrayerOff(p);
				p.getSkills().RestorePray(p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(5));
				p.getSkills().heal(p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(3));
                                    p.specialAmount = 100;
				p.frozen = 0;
				p.isTeleBlocked = false;
				p.veng = false;
				p.vengTimer = 0;	
				p.deathCount += 1;
				p.dfs = 0;
				p.MiasmicDelay = 0;
				p.setDead(false);
				p.SummonPet = false;
				this.stop();
			}
		});
		this.stop();
	}
}

public static void resetVars(Player p) {
	if (p.inClanWars()) {
	p.deathCount += 1;
	}
	p.poisonTicks = 0;
	p.getActionSender().removeTab();
	p.ditch = 0;
	p.resetAttack();
	GameEngine.prayer.PrayerOff(p);
	p.getSkills().RestorePray(p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(5));
	p.specialAmount = 100;
	p.frozen = 0;
	p.isTeleBlocked = false;
	p.veng = false;
	p.vengTimer = 0;	
	p.dfs = 0;
	p.MiasmicDelay = 0;
}

}
[/code]

its the DeathEvent.java

Read full topic

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

This is the first codes method

public void hit(int damage, Hits.HitType type) { try { int hp = this.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.HITPOINTS)*10; if(damage > hp) { damage = hp; } if(!updateFlags.isHitUpdateRequired()) { getHits().setHit1(new Hit(damage*10, type)); updateFlags.setHitUpdateRequired(true); } else { if(!updateFlags.isHit2UpdateRequired()) { getHits().setHit2(new Hit(damage*10, type)); updateFlags.setHit2UpdateRequired(true); } else { queuedHits.add(new Hit(damage*10, type)); } } skills.hit(damage); if(skills.getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) <= 0) { if(!this.isDead()) { World.getInstance().registerEvent(new DeathEvent(this)); } this.setDead(true); } } catch(Exception e) { } }
Ill give u the method when i search death, die, dead.

public int getDeathAnimation() { return !this.appearance.isNpc() ? 7197 : NPCDefinition.forId(this.appearance.getNpcId()).getDeathAnimation(); }

Thats pretty much it these are the imports maybe its hiding??

@modzilla wrote:

if(skills.getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) <= 0) { if(!this.isDead()) { World.getInstance().registerEvent(new DeathEvent(this)); } this.setDead(true); } } catch(Exception e) { } }

this stands out to me a little how about you?

I also have this when i searched destruct

if(this.inSWGame() && GameEngine.swGameTimer == 3) { if(this.swB >= 1 && GameEngine.bluKill < GameEngine.redKill) { this.zeal += 8; this.actionSender.sendMessage("Creation has won! You receive 8 Zeal Points for winning!"); } if(this.swR >= 1 && GameEngine.redKill < GameEngine.bluKill) { this.zeal += 8; this.actionSender.sendMessage("Destruction has won! You receive 8 Zeal Points for winning!"); } if(this.swR >= 1 && GameEngine.redKill > GameEngine.bluKill) { this.zeal += 2; this.actionSender.sendMessage("Destruction has lost. You are rewarded 2 Zeal Points for trying."); } if(this.swB >= 1 && GameEngine.bluKill > GameEngine.redKill) { this.zeal += 2; this.actionSender.sendMessage("Creation has lost. You are rewarded 2 Zeal Points for trying."); } if(this.swB >= 1 && GameEngine.bluKill == GameEngine.redKill) { this.zeal += 1; this.actionSender.sendMessage("The teams have tied. Both teams earn 1 Zeal Point."); } if(this.swR >= 1 && GameEngine.bluKill == GameEngine.redKill) { this.zeal += 1; this.actionSender.sendMessage("The teams have tied. Both teams earn 1 Zeal Point."); } if(this.swR >= 1) { this.teleport(Location.location(1893+Misc.random(2), 3168+Misc.random(4), 0)); } if(this.swB >= 1) { this.teleport(Location.location(1885+Misc.random(2), 3168+Misc.random(4), 0)); } this.swB = 0; this.swR = 0; this.swJB = 0; this.swJR = 0; actionSender.killOverlay(); }
